02-19-2009, 10:28 AM #1 jkshel View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Mar 2001 Posts 191 List of fast food receipts that give free food with survey I wanted to start a new list of fast food restaurants that will give you a free food item for filling out the survey on the bottom of your receipt. The surveys can be done over the phone or online. Usually it is an automated phone survey that takes a few minutes, and you are given a code to write in on your recipe to present as a coupon. Ill start with the two I have:
Taco Bueno Free taco or bean burrito (limit one per day)
Arbys Free Roast Beef or Beef n cheddar sandwich (must complete within 2 days)
If you know of any please post and lets help each other save some money!
JTF Reply With Quote 02-19-2009, 11:01 AM #2 JoyNPeace7 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Dec 2006 Posts 1,043 I went to Burger King last week. On the back of my receipt was an opportunity to take a survey. At the end you get a code good for 1 free hamburger. Reply With Quote 02-19-2009, 12:21 PM #3 KrissyG89 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Sep 2007 Posts 414 I think Wendy's will give you a free frosty if you fill out their survey on the back of the receipt. But I'm not sure... Maybe someone can check on that? Reply With Quote 02-19-2009, 12:24 PM #4 classic pooh View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jun 2001 Location The Heartland Posts 1,305 Buffalo Wild Wings will give you six traditional wings if you fill out their survey. Reply With Quote 02-19-2009, 12:29 PM #5 bunny420 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Apr 2006 Posts 685 Papa Murphys will give you free choclate chip cookie dough survey takes 3 mins Reply With Quote 02-19-2009, 12:33 PM #6 Kolbycheese View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Aug 2007 Posts 250 Sonic gives you a free Route 44 drink if you do the survey at the bottom of their receipt. It can be a Premium drink too, like cherry limade or slushes! Reply With Quote 02-19-2009, 12:39 PM #7 AmberGA View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries Visit Homepage View Articles Registered User Join Date Dec 2003 Posts 573 thanks! Reply With Quote 02-19-2009, 12:42 PM #8 audrey2580 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Oct 2007 Posts 319 Panda Express does a buy 1 entree get 1 free after their survey Reply With Quote 02-19-2009, 01:07 PM #9 kittygirl3 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Nov 2008 Posts 66 Free Food For Survey On my receipt from Wendy's last night - they changed it from a free frosty to a free single hamburger (cheese or bacon extra). Reply With Quote 02-19-2009, 03:10 PM #10 sweetjenn View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Sep 2008 Posts 102 Thank you soooo much for sharing,I had no idea they did this . Reply With Quote
